<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/organizations/{organizationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve organization details using the organization ID. User must be a member of the organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"organizationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Organization ID","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
